President's Office Records (UConn) -- Harry J. Hartley (1990-1976)
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Archives & Special Collections Staff.

publicationstmt.publisher: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2012-07-31T12:15-0400

did.unittitle: University of Connecticut, President's Office Records [Harry J. Hartley, 1990-1997]

repository.corpname: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries

did.abstract: The collection contains administrative records associated with the tenure of Harry J. Hartley, President of the University of Connecticut from 1990-1997.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p:
The collection contains the transcript of an interview between Dr. Hartley and Dr. Bruce Stave of the
Center for Oral History and published materials documenting Dr. Hartley's activities while serving as the President of the University of Connecticut. Dr. Hartley added a complete file on the history of UConn 2000 and a copy of the book he wrote concerning the planning, development and implementation of the $1 billion project in October 2001. Dr. Hartley donated these materials already ordered.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Series I: Oral History and related materials ( undated, 1990-1996)

separatedmaterial.head: Separated Material
separatedmaterial.p: The following materials have been separated from the collection and cataloged:
1995 Connecticut Legislative Guide. Office of Legislative Management. Hartford, CT: Office of Legislative Management, 1995. Dodd Call No.
Beyond 2000: Change; Strategic Plan for the University of Connecticut. University of Connecticut. Storrs, CT: University of Connecticut, 1995. Dodd Call No.
UConn 2000: Four Year Progress Report. University of Connecticut. Storrs, CT: University of Connecticut, 1999. Dodd Call No. C 5540
UConn 2000: Planning, Politicking, and Managing a Billion Dollar Campus Transformation. Hartley, Harry J. Storrs, CT: Harry J. Hartley, 2000. Dodd Call No. C 6607

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open and available for use.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from these Papers must be obtained in writing from both the University of Connecticut Libraries and the owner(s) of the copyright.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item description, #:#], University of Connecticut, President's Office Records [Harry J. Hartley Papers, 1990-1997]. Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Oral History materials transferred from the Center for Oral History in January 1999. Remaining materials transferred from the Office of the President. UConn 200 materials donated by Dr. Hartley in October 2001.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Archives & Special Collections has a substantial collection of materials pertaining to the University, its history, administration, faculty, staff and students. For detailed information on these collections please contact the curator or ask at the Reading Room desk.

did.unittitle: Series I: Oral History and related materials,
Strategic Plan for the University of Connecticut,
Capital Improvement, Authorization and Financing Program, Internal Group Discussion Draft,
Section by section Outline of HB 6785,
Test of HB 6785 and Phase I Projects,
UConn 2000 Task Force Meetings and Minutes,
Board of Governors for Higher Education, FY 1995-1997 Budget,
Part Two: Publications, mailings and brochures
Stories, Editorials, Commentaries, Letters to the Editor,
Appendices for Part I (I, II, III),
